pullRequest.title: #472 - added `auth()` method to Credentials
pullRequest.bodyText:
For #472 I've added auth() method to Credentials interface and created Credentials.FromEnv implementation.
Settings.auth() method now wraps authentication returned by Credentials implementations..
Setting.credentials() method signature was changed to return CompletionStage<Credentials>, corresponding corrections were made in artifactory API slices.

nodes.bodyText: @olenagerasimova since version is off, should be '0.10'
